mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32)
mailBody:
Hi Shubham,

I hope this message finds you well.

Thank you for your guidance. I have utilized the internal data provided and updated the checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC, associated with LEI ID K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32. Below is the updated checklist reflecting the latest information:

### Updated Checklist Table

| Checklist Item                       | Status     | Comment                                                                                  | Source                                  |
|--------------------------------------|------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------|

| Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey | Validated  | Annual accounts and Ellipro scores for 2020–2022 are available.                          | DIM_CompanyAnnualAccountsAndElliproSurvey |
| Company Bank and Postal Details      | Validated  | Bank and postal details are verified with available bank account and SWIFT code.         | DIM_CompanyBankAndPostalDetails         |

| Company Tax Documentation            | Pending    | Tax documents are available but awaiting additional information and review.              | DIM_CompanyTaxDocuments                 |
| Company Regulatory Compliance        | Pending    | Partial compliance data available; several compliance areas are under review.            | DIM_CompanyRegulatory                   |
| Company Business Scope               | Validated  | Verified business scope includes corporation setup and national operations.              | DIM_CompanyBusinessScope                |
| Company PEP Screening                | Validated  | Screening data is available; high-risk individuals identified and flagged.               | Email Attachment                        |
| Company Revenue Details              | Validated  | Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars for the year ended December 31, 2023 is reported. | Annual Report                           |
| Company Market Capitalization Details | Validated  | Market capitalization as of December 31, 2023 is reported as 489,320 million dollars.    | Annual Report                           |

The JSON file containing the detailed checklist has been securely stored and is available for your reference.

If you have any further questions or need additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
